title: Have Another Drink
description: Waking up on the lawn of a stranger with no memory of the night before is only the beginning for Kim. Struggling to piece things together, the answers she uncovers send her into a spiral of depression and crippling guilt. As Kim tries to deal with her own trauma, she encounters a world of silent anguish that is a lot closer than she realized and also has to contend with a family tragedy that may very well tip her over the edge.
author: Erin Kinsella
